title: Jadé Tuncdoruk joins Jennifer Aniston and Gwen Stefani to win prestigious Australian award
text:
Sydney influencer Jadé Tuncdoruk has made history as the first Australian to win a prestigious award alongside the likes of Jennifer Aniston and Gwen Stefani.

The 24-year-old Instagram personality will join Hollywood's biggest stars as she is crowned the first ever Australian Social Star of 2019 at the E! People's Choice Awards next month.

Speaking about her win, Jadé said: 'Being recognised for this award is a milestone I’ll never forget!'

What an honour! Sydney influencer Jadé Tuncdoruk (pictured) has made history as the first Australian to receive the prestigious E! award

Jadé said she was 'absolutely thrilled' to be honoured with the new award and thanked her thousands of followers for helping her achieve her dreams.

'I’m absolutely thrilled to have won the first E! Australia award for Social Star of 2019,' she said, thanking her followers for voting.

'I’ve been creating content since I was 14. If someone had told me back then where I’d be today, I just wouldn’t have believed them.'

Over the moon! 'I’m absolutely thrilled to have won the first E! Australia award for Social Star of 2019,' Jadé said

With a following of more than 390,000 people, Jadé was praised for promoting body positivity and addressing tough topics like cyber bullying.

She runs two accounts - one to document beautifully-curated content and another with witty, honest uploads to bust the myth that all influencers' lives are perfect.

Jadé rose to fame by documenting her weight loss journey on Instagram after experiencing bullying as a teenager due to her size.

Tough topics: Jadé rose to fame by documenting her weight loss journey on Instagram after experiencing bullying as a teenager due to her size

Jadé beat a number of Australian Instagram stars to win the award, including nominees Elle Ferguson, Kate Wasley, Lisa Danielle Smith, Nikkia Joy and Rozalia Russian.

She will join a host of other award winners on the red carpet for the E! People’s Choice Awards in Los Angeles on November 11.

Friends star Jennifer Aniston will be crowned the People's Icon of 2019, while Gwen Stefani will receive the Fashion Icon accolade.
description: Jadé Tuncdoruk (pictured) has made history as the first Australian to receive a prestigious award alongside the likes of Jennifer Aniston and Gwen Stefani.
authors: Jess Bell For Daily Mail Australia
